summary: A letter from the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, transmitting discovery materials to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell in her criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the inmate at MDC to whom discovery materials are being transmitted in her criminal case.

locations: U.S. Department of Justice, Southern District of New York, The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a formal transmittal of discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell while she was incarcerated.
It confirms Maxwell was an inmate at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) under inmate number 02879-509.
The correspondence is related to the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The letter is dated September 29, 2020, during the pre-trial phase of Maxwell's prosecution.
It demonstrates the procedural step of the prosecution providing discovery to the defense as required by law.
